_meta.name: wf_portrait_v1

placeholders.{{POSITIVE_PROMPT}}: Main generation prompt with style suffix

_meta.notes: Locked to Kimbar style guide: bust portrait, 3/4 view, centered composition, neutral background, soft top-left light, muted palette, no text or watermark. Output 768x768 for downscale to 256 or 128.

inputs.text: {{POSITIVE_PROMPT}}, bust portrait, head and shoulders, 3/4 view, centered composition, neutral background, soft studio light from top-left, muted palette, clean edges, minimal texture, stylized illustration, no photorealism, kimbar_style_v1
{{NEGATIVE_PROMPT}}, deformed, ugly, blurry, low quality, text, watermark, logo, signature, pixelated, noisy, photorealistic, cropped, out of frame, full body, hands
